subject: Indianapolis 500 (Auto Race)
Automobiles
Automobile Racing
lead_paragraph: Donald Trump said he would not be the celebrity pace-car driver for the Indianapolis 500 on May 29, calling it “inappropriate” since “he may be announcing shortly his intention” to run for president.
snippet: Donald Trump said he would not be the celebrity pace-car driver for the Indianapolis 500 on May 29, calling it “inappropriate” since “he may be announcing shortly his intention” to run for president.
